name: Ortlieb Back-Roller Free Panniers
description: These panniers are known for their durability and reliability – they're great companions for your bike tours or everyday commutes. The waterproof fabric and roll-top closure seals out rain and splashes on the inevitable rainy days that happen when you're a regular rider, and the material is PVC-free to make them a better option for people and the environment.PU-coated polyester and nylon fabric is completely waterproof.IP64 waterproof rating means these are perfect for rainy weather.QL2.1 fixing system for easy installation and removal on your bike rack.Fixing system is adjustable to fit your rack.Shoulder strap for carrying comfort off the rack.Fits racks with tubes 16, 12, 10 and 8mm in diameter.3M Scotchlite reflective patches keeps you visible.Edge protector prevent premature wear.Capacity is 20L per pannier. Max load is 9kg per pannier.Sold as a pair.
